hero-subtitle: An international seaside restaurant where you can taste the ocean.
menu-item-1-desc: Mediterranean-style grilled salmon served with fresh vegetables and lemon sauce
menu-item-2-desc: Spanish-style seafood paella with shrimp, mussels, squid in fragrant spiced rice
about-subtitle: Experience the taste of the ocean
about-description-1: Coco’s Nai Harn Restaurant is an international seaside restaurant blending global flavors, especially Mediterranean, European, and fresh seafood.
about-description-2: We use fresh ingredients from the sea combined with traditional cooking techniques to offer you a unique dining experience.
review-1-text: The food was absolutely delicious. The sea view was stunning, and the atmosphere was so romantic — perfect for a date with your partner. The staff provided excellent service. I’ll definitely come back again!
review-2-text: Came with my family — everyone loved it! The seafood was fresh, flavorful, and reasonably priced. The place was clean with a beautiful view. Highly recommended
review-3-text: Amazing seafood restaurant! The view is spectacular and the food is authentic. The grilled salmon was perfectly cooked. Highly recommend for tourists visiting Thailand!
contact-address-detail: 123 Patong Beach Road, Patong Subdistrict, Kathu District, Phuket 83150
contact-reservation-desc: Call +66 38-123-456 or message us on Facebook
footer-description: An international seaside restaurant where you can taste the ocean.
